scripts.build: tsc --build dataregistry dataregistry-extension && jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-extension run generateSchema
scripts.build:dev: jlpm install && jlpm clean jlpm run build && jlpm run link
scripts.clean: jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry run clean && jlpm workspace @jupyterlab/dataregistry-extension run clean
scripts.link: jupyter labextension link dataregistry --no-build && jupyter labextension link dataregistry-extension
scripts.unlink: jupyter labextension unlink dataregistry --no-build && jupyter labextension unlink dataregistry-extension
